findings.fix: Mark session cookies Secure (and serve over HTTPS).
findings.title: Session cookie missing Secure

findings.fix: Mark session cookies HttpOnly to reduce XSS token theft risk.
findings.title: Session cookie missing HttpOnly

findings.fix: Chrome requires Secure when SameSite=None. Add Secure or change SameSite.
findings.title: SameSite=None cookie without Secure

findings.fix: Mark session cookies Secure (and serve over HTTPS).
findings.title: Session cookie missing Secure

findings.fix: Mark session cookies HttpOnly to reduce XSS token theft risk.
findings.title: Session cookie missing HttpOnly

findings.fix: Do not put tokens in URLs. Use Authorization header or secure cookies.
findings.title: Token appears in URL query string

findings.fix: Avoid implicit/hybrid flows; use Authorization Code + PKCE.
findings.title: Token appears in URL fragment

findings.fix: Always include and validate state to prevent CSRF/code injection.
findings.title: Callback has code but no state

findings.fix: Prefer S256 for PKCE. Avoid 'plain' except in constrained environments.
findings.title: PKCE code_challenge_method is not S256
